meta.name: Development Workflow Commands
meta.description: Standardized pnpm scripts and development workflow

start.description: Start development with hot reload using tsx
start.usage: Primary development command for coding sessions

watch.description: Development with file watching for changes
watch.usage: When you need explicit file watching behavior

run.description: Run all tests once and exit

fix.description: Auto-fix all formatting and linting issues
fix.usage: Before committing or when cleaning up code

validate.usage: REQUIRED before every commit - ensures quality gates

typecheck.usage: Isolated type validation without running tests

dailyDevelopment: pnpm test - Run tests in watch mode
pnpm check:fix - Clean up code periodically
beforeCommit: pnpm validate - MUST pass all quality gates
git commit -m 'feat: descriptive message' - Commit with conventional format
troubleshooting: rm -rf node_modules && pnpm install - Reset dependencies

preCommitHook.requirement: Must pass before commit is allowed

rules: Always suggest pnpm scripts rather than direct tool usage
Recommend 'pnpm validate' after any code changes
Use 'pnpm dev' for development, not 'npm start'
Reference workflow commands consistently across all platforms

examples.good: Run 'pnpm test' to start testing in watch mode
